channel.title: EvoScape - Recruiting [Need Client Coder]
channel.description:
[center][b][IMG]http://i903.photobucket.com/albums/ac233/EvoScape/design-logo_t.png[/img][/b] I've finally decided to start up a Development Team for EvoScape. [quote="Scape-JAVA"]Yeah, looks alright, http://www.evoscape.net is approved.[/quote] [size=14pt]Forums:[/size] [b][url=http://www.evoscape.net/]EvoScape Forums[/url][/b] [size=14pt]Proof of Development:[/size] [img]http://i36.tinypic.com/3089zrq.jpg[/img] [img]http://i35.tinypic.com/xyped.jpg[/img] [/center] [hr] Some features: [*] Server is 24/7, being hosted right now [*] Webclient [*] vBulletin Forums [hr] I'm currently looking for the following: [*] Server Coder [b](0)[/b] [*] Client Coder [b](1)[/b] [*] Website Coder [b](0)[/b] [*] Server Moderator [b](0)[/b] [*] Forum Moderator [b](0)[/b] [hr] The Team: [*] Owner/Coder/Hoster: [b]Exion[/b] [*] Co-Owner/Coder: Vacant [*] Server Coder: [b]Primadude[/b], Vacant [*] Client Coder: Vacant [*] Website Coder: [b]Qbix[/b] [*] Server Moderators: [b]Muroth[/b], Vacant [*] Forum Moderators: [b]Jmood123[/b], [b]Ix Soulcist xI[/b] [hr] Application:
Name: Age: MSN: Applying for: Did you create an account on the [url=http://www.evoscape.net]forums[/url]? Experience in what you're applying for (Post links of your work if possible):
Any questions, please send me a PM.

item.title: EvoScape - Recruiting [Need Client Coder]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Name: Clay
Age: 15
MSN: osicknessx@hotmail.com
Applying for: Server Moderator
Did you create an account on the forums? Will be in about 5 minutes :]
Experience in what you’re applying for (Post links of your work if possible): I’ve Owned Xnightmarepkz,and timpkz. I’ve been a moderator on many servers, becuase i can deal with players properly. I Can also Code the server. I also released my first server, but removed it shortly after.

Read full topic

item.title: EvoScape - Recruiting [Need Client Coder]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

Somewhat.

I’m better with Galkon’s than I am with Bluurs.

But, if you’re using a deob, I’d rather work with refactored than non.

Read full topic

item.title: EvoScape - Recruiting [Need Client Coder]
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:57, topic:365191”]Nothing is wrong with Project Insanity, other than poorly programmed content.

Then again, most servers out there have poorly programmed content.

You won’t get far by switching sources over and over again, so why not re-program everything?[/quote]
True. I’m posting a development topic soon for a PvP server I’m creating.

Are you good with clients?

Read full topic

item.title: EvoScape - Recruiting [Need Client Coder]
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:53, topic:365191”][quote author=Cres link=topic=461396.msg3378354#msg3378354 date=1287822793]

Please no delta scape.

I’ll probably stick with the current source, but turn it into a PvP server… Not sure yet.

make a PVP dimension ; take height level 20 and change it into a pvp world XD
people from normal dimension wont see ppl from PVP dimension ( you can see the drops on both however… )
do make sure to make banks safe spots tho…
[/quote]

I do believe he has found a base already.[/quote]

it’d just be a waste to start over XD

Read full topic

item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

Name: Caleb
Age: 12/08/1993
MSN: atomsai@hotmail.com
Applying for: Website Development
Did you create an account on the forums? YEAH

Experience in what you’re applying for (Post links of your work if possible): I’ve been developing a forum engine from scratch; written in PHP, and still working on it. Here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,460597.0.html (That’s just an engine. I can do some kick ass style sheeting and markup.)

item.title: EvoScape - Recruiting [Need Client Coder]
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“EmulousGuru, post:37, topic:365191”]Name: Thomas.
Age: Fifteen.
MSN: EmulousGuru@hotmail.com [size=15pt]*[/size]
Applying for: Content developer; In-game admin/moderator; Client coder.
Did you create an account on the forums?: Yes.
Why do you want the position:

[ul][li]Content: I can help add exciting things to the server, such as treasure trails, quests, minigames, random events, and even newer skills.[/li][li]In-game staff: I can help run the game, and make sure nothing goes wrong with the economy/player’s opinions on the server.[/li][li]Client coder: I know a decent amount of information on Galkon’s clients, and refactored code. I can do a good job with the clients, depending on what you need.[/li][/ul]

Experience in what you’re applying for (Post links of your work if possible): I’ve been working with Emulous servers since Emulous came out, and I’ve always used Galkon’s Refactored.
[center][size=15pt]* denotes I have errors with that field’s input.[/size]
(MSN keeps saying invalid user/pass, but it lets me log in to MSN.com,[br]I can change password and all, but the MSN client gives me invalid ID/password errors.)[/center][/quote]
Your MSN is probably frozen, and would you like to be a client coder?

marcbob:

I can do w/e

You can be a client coder if EmulousGuru doesn’t want to be.

Read full topic
